sentence.Network_en: Such stinginess came from my side of the family.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种吝啬是我这边的祖先遗传下来的.

sentence.Network_en: His stinginess with money is known among all of us.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们都知道他在钱上很吝啬.

sentence.Network_en: One of adherents complained of the stinginess of his wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 一名弟子向他抱怨妻子小气.
